text:
ConsoleAppender does not produce any output is it is used as part of a WebLogic 
servlet. The method Configurator.configure() is called in HttpServlet.init() as 
recommended.

The possible reason for this behaviour is ConsoleAppender stores a link to 
System.out stream in its local variable, but WebLogic changes the System.out 
after ConsoleAppender initializes.
creator: andrei.mikhniak@stortext.com
